OBJECTIVE.name: Objective
OBJECTIVE.description: Sentences that describe the main purpose, goal, or research question of the study.

METHODS.name: Methods
METHODS.description: Sentences detailing the methodology used in the study, including study design, participants, interventions, and statistical analysis.

RESULTS.name: Results
RESULTS.description: Sentences presenting the main findings and outcomes of the research, often including statistical data.

CONCLUSIONS.name: Conclusions
CONCLUSIONS.description: Sentences summarizing the study's main takeaways, interpretations of the results, and implications.

BACKGROUND.name: Background
BACKGROUND.description: Sentences providing context, previous research, and the rationale for conducting the current study.
